title: Backend with Node JS for beginners
desc: This blog is meant to help you create a REST API that can read and write data in a local database. We've included some extra resources like websites, videos, and project ideas with source code to make learning easier. These will come in handy as you work on building your own REST API. Think of it as a guide and revision tool all rolled into one.
author: Atanu Nayak

title: All Shortest Path Algorithms
desc: The basic theory behind all the shortest path algorithms are listed here, along with 15+ questions from websites like leetcode that will help you strengthen your grip over shortest path algorithms.
author: Atanu Nayak
Anurag Chakraborty

title: Connect your Github with Local System
desc: We have listed down all the resources that you would require to get started on github. This blog is for straight beginners you want to fork a project or wants to make thier first commit. There is a bonus aswell, we have also listed the best beginner friendly open sourced projects.
author: Ayush Pandit

title: Start Open Source with Web Development
desc: The purpose of this blog is to provide an understanding of how open source operates and the level of web development knowledge needed to get started. It also includes a list of recommended open source projects to begin working on.
author: Atanu Nayak
